Name: Futanari Vampire Girlfriend
About the game: After browsing a hookup app, you happen find your dream girl. A crazy-hot goth girl with a feisty attitude. She also admits to having a few surprises in store for a willing candidate. You happen to be a match on the app and arrange a date. Upon meeting, your breath is taken away. She's everything you imagined--and more. Little do you know, that you're in way over your head. Read through some pretty raunchy(erotic) dialogue, accompanied by spicy nude depictions. Challenge accepted? Gameplay Kinetic Visual Novel H-Scenes ~5K words
